fee_codes.description: Special visit for obstetrical delivery with sacrifice of office hours for the first patient seen.

rules: Special visit premiums are only eligible for payment when rendered with certain services listed under 'Consultations and Visits' and 'Diagnostic and Therapeutic Procedures'.
Special visit premiums are not eligible for payment in specific circumstances such as during hospital rounds, elective admissions, or for patients seen without an appointment.
notes: Special visit premiums may include a travel premium and a patient seen premium.
Maximums and limitations apply to the number of patients eligible for special visit premiums.
